title: Fox Campaigns
author: Fox Campaigns
content: Polkastation combines various DeFi protocols, NFT minting, and marketplace with the Polkadot framework as its base. Though early blockchains serve the purpose of deploying decentralized applications, there are limitations like lack of run-time specialization and limited throughput. Polkastation wants to deliver a cutting-edge project in the blockchain space and thus chooses Polkadot, bridging multiple specialized chains into one shared network. Polkadot offers the best returns in the market through various products. As these decentralized applications are deployed on Polkastation's own blockchains, they have enhanced stability.Learn more about the Polkastation Finance1. Bounty Campaign Starts on: 19 September - 02 October (2 weeks)2. $10,000 worth of POLKAS tokens will be distributed within 2 months after the bounty is over.3. Complete tasks and make reports every week! 4. Connect with Polkastation  in social media;- Twitter: https://twitter.com/PolkaStation- Telegram Channel: https://t.me/Polkastation_Press- Telegram Group: https://t.me/Polkastation_Discussions- Linkedin https://www.linkedin.com/company/polkastation- Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/user/Polkastation- Medium: https://medium.com/@polkastation2022- YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBlst9AmuzsH4yjy6YIgVGQ- Learn more about Polkastation: https://polkastation.finance/5. Tokens will be distributed depending on the quality of your work.6. Spammers, cheaters, bots, and similar participants will be banned immediately!7. Follow all the bounty groups/channels to get support and to stay updated;-  Polkastation Bounty: https://t.me/polkastationbounty- Foxcampaigns Group: https://t.me/foxcampaigns- Foxcampaigns Channel: https://t.me/foxannouncementsNote:If you are disqualified for any reason, you will NOT receive any rewards. All rights reserved by Fox Campaigns and the Polkastation team. We can make any changes to the campaign rules, if applicable.By joining these campaigns, you're accepting these above terms.Code:Proof of authentication;Telegram username:Campaigns applied:BSC wallet address:$10,000 worth of POLKAS tokens will be distributed in this campaign. Only participants with quality work(s) will be rewarded;- Content Campaign: 30%- Twitter Campaign: 30%- Instagram Campaign: 20%- Telegram Campaign: 20%Note:There is a limit of 500 participants in this campaign.Tokens:-1 - 10 stakes depending on the content quality (video/article).Rules:- Videos must have at least 200 views to qualify.- We accept original videos only with at least 3 minutes.- Only English language is accepted in videos and articles.- Write a good description about Polkastation in your video. - Videos with no user's voice will not be accepted.- Attach Polkastation links in your video description and articles.- Only YouTube and TikTok videos will be accepted!- 2 videos and 2 articles per person are allowed.- Articles must have at least 50 views to qualify.- We accept original articles only with at least 500 words.- Submit articles on Medium, Steem, Linkedin, ReadCash.  - Visit polkastation.finance to learn more about it and write your articles.JOIN HERE   -   SPREADSHEETS Stakes:- 300 to 1000 followers: 4 stakes per week- 1001 to 2500 followers: 8 stakes per week- 2501 to 5500 followers: 12 stakes per week- 5501 to 10,000 followers: 16 stakes per week- 10,000+ followers: 20 stakes per weekRules:1. Have at least 300 followers to participate.2. Must follow Polkastation Twitter account: @PolkaStation3. Make 1 post and 1 repost, per day. Submit report weekly to receive stakes.4. Minimum of 10 posts per week (5 tweets, 5 retweets)5. Use these hashtags; #POLKAS #POLKASTATION #BSC #foxcampaigns #blockchain #CryptoJOIN HERE   -   SPREADSHEETS Code:[ Twitter Report ]Twitter Profile Link:Week #:Tweet Link #1:Tweet Link #2:Tweet Link #3:Tweet Link #4:Tweet Link #5:Retweet Link #1: Retweet Link #2:Retweet Link #3:Retweet Link #4:Retweet Link #5:Stakes:- 300 to 1000 followers: 4 stakes per week- 1001 to 2500 followers: 8 stakes per week- 2501 to 5500 followers: 12 stakes per week- 5501 to 10,000 followers: 16 stakes per week- 10,000+ followers: 20 stakes per weekRules:1. Have at least 300 followers to participate.2. Make 2 custom posts per day. Submit report weekly to receive stakes.3. Minimum of 10 posts per week (10 custom posts)4. Use these hashtags; #POLKAS #POLKASTATION #BSC #foxcampaigns #blockchain #CryptoJOIN HERE   -   SPREADSHEETS Code:[ Instagram Report ]Instagram Profile Link:Week #:Post Link #1:Post Link #2:Post Link #3:Post Link #4:Post Link #5:Post Link #6:Post Link #7:Post Link #8:Post Link #9:Post Link #10:Stakes:- 1 quality post: 1 stake.- 20 one-time stakes for wearing Polkastation avatar and name.- Wear the Avatar until the end of the campaign and you will get stakes.- Download AvatarRules:1. Must join Polkastation group: https://t.me/Polkastation_Discussions2. Write posts in the official Polkastation group (only quality posts accepted)3. If you write any spam message you will be banned immediately4. Max posts per day: 2, Max posts per week: 105. You can ask questions about Polkastation in the official group, but do not Spam!6. You will not be paid if you remove the avatar before the end of the campaign!7. DO NOT USE HASHTAGS IN YOUR TELEGRAM POSTS!JOIN HERE   -   SPREADSHEETS Code:[ Telegram Report ]Week #:Post Link #1:Post Link #2:Post Link #3:Post Link #4:Post Link #5:Post Link #6:Post Link #7:Post Link #8:Post Link #9:Post Link #10:Week 01: 19 Sept - Sept 25Week 02: 26 Sept - Oct 02
